dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Much of Kazakhstan's oil exports are completely cut off from global markets, but that's actually not the case at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Much of Kazakhstan's oil exports are completely cut off from global markets, but that's actually not the case at all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The CPC is a key route for exporting Kazakh oil. In 2024, Kazakhstan exported 68.6 million tonnes of oil, with 54.9 million tonnes—around 80 percent—transported via the CPC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because the U.S. Treasury just issued a new license, number 124, specifically for the Caspian Pipeline Consortium.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because the U.S. Treasury just issued a new license, number one hundred twenty four, specifically for the Caspian Pipeline Consortium.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The U.S. Department of the Treasury has issued a license allowing oil services linked to the Caspian Pipeline Consortium (CPC) and Tengizchevroil (TCO) projects, according to an official announcement. License No. 124, published on the Treasury's website, authorizes all transactions prohibited by the determination of January 10, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It authorizes all those previously prohibited transactions for the CPC and the Tengizchevroil project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It authorizes all those previously prohibited transactions for the C P C and the Tengizchevroil project.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The U.S. Department of the Treasury has issued a license allowing oil services linked to the Caspian Pipeline Consortium (CPC) and Tengizchevroil (TCO) projects, according to an official announcement. License No. 124, published on the Treasury's website, authorizes all transactions prohibited by the determination of January 10, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is huge, because that pipeline is a major artery. It moves oil from the Tengiz field all the way to the Black Sea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is huge, because that pipeline is a major artery. It moves oil from the Tengiz field all the way to the Black Sea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It connects the Tengiz oil field in western Kazakhstan to the Yuzhnaya Ozereevka terminal on the Black Sea, near the Russian port of Novorossiysk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And we're talking about a massive amount of oil, like 81.5 million tonnes of annual throughput capacity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And we're talking about a massive amount of oil, like eighty one point five million tonnes of annual throughput capacity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: CPC's annual capacity stands at 81.5 million tonnes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and last year, Kazakhstan exported almost 55 million tonnes through it, which is what, about 80 percent of their total?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and last year, Kazakhstan exported almost fifty five million tonnes through it, which is what, about eighty percent of their total?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2024, Kazakhstan exported 68.6 million tonnes of oil, with 54.9 million tonnes—around 80 percent—transported via the CPC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Something like that, yeah. So this license is basically keeping that whole operation running smoothly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Something like that, yeah. So this license is basically keeping that whole operation running smoothly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though, because the pipeline does run through Russia to get to that terminal near Novorossiysk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though, because the pipeline does run through Russia to get to that terminal near Novorossiysk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It connects the Tengiz oil field in western Kazakhstan to the Yuzhnaya Ozereevka terminal on the Black Sea, near the Russian port of Novorossiysk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's the tricky part, but the license seems to carve out an exception for these specific projects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the tricky part, but the license seems to carve out an exception for these specific projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Tengizchevroil itself is a major joint venture, with Chevron holding a 50 percent stake.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Tengizchevroil itself is a major joint venture, with Chevron holding a fifty percent stake.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tengizchevroil's shareholders include Chevron Corp. (50%), ExxonMobil Kazakhstan Ventures Inc. (25%), KazMunayGas (20%), and Lukoil (5%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, along with ExxonMobil, KazMunayGas, and a smaller share for Lukoil.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, along with ExxonMobil, KazMunayGas, and a smaller share for Lukoil.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tengizchevroil's shareholders include Chevron Corp. (50%), ExxonMobil Kazakhstan Ventures Inc. (25%), KazMunayGas (20%), and Lukoil (5%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So this isn't just about Kazakhstan; it involves some big international players.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this isn't just about Kazakhstan; it involves some big international players.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And it overrides that previous determination from back in January.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And it overrides that previous determination from back in January.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: License No. 124, published on the Treasury's website, authorizes all transactions prohibited by the determination of January 10, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The timing is key too, because the old license, number 121, was set to expire in June next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The timing is key too, because the old license, number one hundred twenty one, was set to expire in June next year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The previous license, No. 121, is set to expire on June 28, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So this provides continuity, which is crucial for planning and stability in the region's energy exports.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this provides continuity, which is crucial for planning and stability in the region's energy exports.
